_template_info.use_for: Multi-scene video with consistent style, flexible scene count (3-20+)
_template_info.author: BMAD JSON Prompt Generator
_template_info.notes: This template supports ANY number of scenes - just add/remove from scenes array

sequence_metadata.title: CHANGE_ME Evolution of Human Tools
sequence_metadata.video_type: CHANGE_ME Educational documentary, brand story, product evolution

global_consistency._purpose: These settings apply to ALL scenes to maintain visual coherence

visual_style_mandate.overall_aesthetic: CHANGE_ME Cinematic photorealism with film grain texture
visual_style_mandate.film_reference: CHANGE_ME OpenAI Super Bowl commercial style
visual_style_mandate.mood_arc: CHANGE_ME Starts dramatic/ancient, evolves to bright/futuristic

camera_consistency.lens_family: CHANGE_ME Prime lenses only (35mm or 50mm throughout)
camera_consistency.shot_type_consistency: CHANGE_ME All extreme close-ups on hands/tools
camera_consistency.camera_movement_style: CHANGE_ME Slow, deliberate, minimal movement (static or gentle dolly)
camera_consistency.framing_philosophy: CHANGE_ME Consistent framing (hands centered, similar composition)
camera_consistency.depth_of_field: CHANGE_ME Shallow throughout (subject sharp, background soft)

color_evolution._purpose: Color palette gradually shifts across scenes to show progression

start_palette.description: Warm earthy browns, deep blacks, fire orange

mid_palette.description: Transitional browns, emerging blues, lighter tones

end_palette.description: Cool cyan, vibrant orange, tech dark grey

color_evolution.shift_strategy: CHANGE_ME Each scene shifts palette 20-30% toward end_palette
color_evolution.consistency_rule: Maintain tonal coherence, no jarring jumps

lighting_progression._purpose: Lighting evolves to match time period
lighting_progression.style_consistency: CHANGE_ME Dramatic contrast maintained (always chiaroscuro or high contrast)

grain_and_texture.film_grain: CHANGE_ME Heavy 35mm Kodak grain (consistent across all scenes)
grain_and_texture.texture_treatment: CHANGE_ME Photorealistic, preserve detail, no smoothing
grain_and_texture.consistency_note: Same grain intensity/style in every scene

scenes._note: This is Scene 1 - POPULATE ALL FIELDS
scenes.inherits_from_global: Yes - uses global lens, grain, style
scenes.scene_name: CHANGE_ME Stone Age - Fire and Stone
scenes.environment: CHANGE_ME Dark cave interior, fire casting dancing shadows on rough walls
scenes.subject_action: CHANGE_ME Ancient hands chiseling stone with primitive hammer
scene_specific_negatives: modern tools, metal objects, contemporary elements

scenes._note: This is Scene 2 - ADD MORE SCENES AS NEEDED
scenes.environment: CHANGE_ME Wooden workshop, morning sunlight through window, workbench with metal tools
scenes.subject_action: CHANGE_ME Craftsman hands using chisel on wood

color_palette_this_scene.position_in_evolution: MIDDLE - transitioning to lighter browns, hints of blue

scenes.environment: CHANGE_ME Clean minimalist desk, computer screen glow, modern office aesthetic
scenes.subject_action: CHANGE_ME Hands typing code on keyboard, blue screen illumination

color_palette_this_scene.position_in_evolution: END - cool blues, bright tones, tech aesthetic

lighting_this_scene.style: Low-key with screen as key light

scenes._instructions: ADD MORE SCENES HERE - Template supports 3 to 20+ scenes
scenes._example: For 10-scene video, copy the structure above and modify scene_number, scene_name, environment, colors, lighting
scenes._flexibility: Each scene inherits global settings (lens, grain, style) but specifies its own environment, colors, lighting
scenes._consistency: Color evolution from start_palette → end_palette happens gradually across all scenes

transitions.transition_style: CHANGE_ME Seamless morph/dissolve, match-cut on hands where possible
transitions.timing_notes: Each transition adds 1 second to total duration

audio_concept._note: Audio is conceptual - most video generators don't support audio yet
audio_concept.sound_design_concept: CHANGE_ME Diegetic sounds from each era (chiseling, hammering, typing, digital)
audio_concept.music_concept: CHANGE_ME Minimal ambient score, building from primitive to electronic

negative_prompts_global._purpose: These apply to ALL scenes in the sequence
negatives: inconsistent style across scenes, jarring visual differences
low quality, blurry, pixelated, compression artifacts
cartoon, anime, illustration, CGI render, non-photorealistic
text overlays, watermarks, logos, UI elements, subtitles
deformed anatomy, extra fingers, missing limbs, incorrect human proportions
plastic skin, waxy smoothing, over-processed, artificial appearance
color banding, harsh color transitions, oversaturation
lens flares (unless specified), fish-eye distortion, chromatic aberration
duplicate subjects, cloning artifacts, stitching errors
physics violations, floating objects, impossible scenarios
poor transitions, hard cuts that break flow

generation_workflow.step_2: Set global_consistency (lens, color evolution, lighting arc, grain)
generation_workflow.step_3: For each scene: Copy scene structure and populate scene-specific details
generation_workflow.step_4: Ensure color_palette_this_scene follows evolution from start→end
generation_workflow.step_5: Convert each scene JSON → text prompt using conversion workflow
generation_workflow.step_6: Generate images for each scene (nanobanana or gpt-image-1)
generation_workflow.step_7: Animate each image with mcp__sora2__create_fade_animation (3-4s each)

example_use_cases: Product evolution (3-5 scenes): V1 prototype → V2 → V3 → Current
Brand story (5-10 scenes): Founding → Growth → Milestones → Today
Tutorial sequence (10-20 scenes): Step 1 → Step 2 → ... → Complete
Historical timeline (5-15 scenes): Ancient → Medieval → Modern → Future
Process visualization (3-8 scenes): Raw material → Processing → Final product
